I think its clearer than normal...I heard everything the 1st go round, normally it takes me a few times.
  Nice job.
  Rhonda

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
           This is random mode, and  just wondering if anyone else thinks it's clearer than the usual linear voices. I can't help they say about me, it is what I get. I can't make up my mind if random is better, or linear is better, or they are the same, and maybe it depends on conditions from thier side. So now I'll have to add random to all boxes, at least a few more anyway. 
 
 Frank-S
